trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_SEQ_00<tab>Gurcant is eyeing fertile new fields for Summerford Farms, but pests perturb his plows.

TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to either Staelwyrn or Gurcant at Summerford Farms, depending on your progress.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_SEQ_02<tab>The fields are now ripe for tillage. Deliver the good news to Gurcant.

TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_SEQ_03<tab>Gurcant laments having to ask outsiders for help, especially considering all the one-time swashbucklers loitering about. All the same, he is grateful for your assistance.

TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and accept it again to restart.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and accept it again to restart.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_1<tab>Blast! How's a botanist supposed to accomplish fieldwork without a field to work in?
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_2<tab>Washed-up pirates are well and good when you want a field pillaged and plundered, but not when you need it plowed.

TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_3<tab>A lone horticulturalist such as myself hardly strikes fear in the hearts of monsters, but your gait is such that I believe <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> might.
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_4<tab>I'd be much obliged if you could rid the field of some mandragoras. With five fewer of the sprouting critters roaming about, I'm sure I could return to my work.
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_11<tab>How about that! You've already done more than that whole lot of slothful sea slugs combined.
TEXT_SUBSEA052_00464_GURCANT_000_12<tab>If only they spent half as much time proving their worth as they do talking about it.
